text: wsft aladhin kafaruu wdaeyhm 'iilaa alhudaa wal'iiman ksft alraey aldhy ysyh balbhaym wyzjrha, wahi la tafham maeani klamh, wa'iinama tasmae alnida' wdawi alsawt fqt. hwla' alkufaar summ sddu asmaehm ean alhq, bukm akhrsu 'alsinatahum ean alntq bh, eumy la taraa 'aeyunuhum brahynh albahrt, fahum la yaemalun eqwlhm fima ynfehm
